item.title: HTB - Admirer
item.description: Admirer 10.10.10.187 Write-Up Recon with NMAP shows three ports. 21, 22, 80. No progress on the first two. The apache service on 80 displays a gallery website with no useful links. Robots.txt reveals /admin-dir, but we do not have permission to view it. Fuzzing /admin-dir/ revealed contacts.txt, which contains some admin and developer e-mails, and credentials.txt, which has creds for an FTP, Wordpress, and internal mail account. Connecting to the FTP server gives us an SQL dump and backup of the site files.
